Posts.Content: May 17, 2007 09:26AM FionaK wrote: The process of waiting weeks for my Mum's tests and diagnosis was so difficult. Her mammogram didn't even show any abnormality! I don't think I could bear the thought of waiting and hoping like that. My family has a history of young breast and ovarian cancer so I would seriously consider double mastectomy. Especially if I have BRCA genes, that would be it for me. I figure if you can remove the risk entirely, then why not?
Posts.Title: OK Girls - I Want Your Honest Opinion skbennett jz20022001
